Text:
Hi bobiras22,
 Thank you so much for your posts.I've installed the apk and downloaded the sd data by using wifi on my xperia ray, but the game did not show the picture. All The texture became white. Is there any trick that I should follow?

@azhbro88

If you have root try with the chainire to change the graphics and the plugins.Maybe this game isnt optimized for your mobile.
